title: Model: A1534  Not sure where to start, distorted screen
message:
Good evening, 

I am new to the forum, and I am currently working on A1534 2015 Macbook. The screen on the laptop gets distorted after the laptop is on for a few minutes. Could someone point me in the direction of trying to get this fixed. I have ran the apple hardware test it shows no faults.

title: Model: A1534  Not sure where to start, distorted screen
